attributes.title: THIS APP IS OFFENSIVE 😾😾😾😾
attributes.review: i was told trump was short for trumpet 🎺 but apparently this app is just a beginnings guide to oranges?!?!?! slicing, peeling, juicing, all i see is orange, orange, orange. not a single tangerine or clementine? not only is this app misleading, but also extremely discriminatory against the fruits. me and my children anna borshôn, keel almond (d is silent), and timmy turner will take our trumpeteering elsewhere. our family trumpet legacy is very important, and it is not a joke. i would like to have a word with the manager.

attributes.title: TRASH
attributes.review: This app is horrible horrendous like why in the world would someone download this app. I opened it and obviously it crashed..... what can I say, I expected nothing less. Anyways yeah don’t use this app, it’s slow and takes up too much space. Oh also I could feel my brain cells dying as I opened this app and I care about y’alls to much to let you go through the same. Hope this is useful ✌🏼✌🏼

attributes.title: Worst app EVER
attributes.review: I downloaded this app as a joke because I am Mexican. I was folding the dishes when all of a sudden my phone started ringing and it was from the app. At this point I’m thinking oh no I forgot to delete the trump app thingy. But when I tried to delete it, it didn’t want to delete and my mom caught me with the app and told I can no longer get my pet car because I really wanted one but now I can’t get one :(

attributes.title: ALL APPS MATTER 😡
attributes.review: I downloaded this app just to check on how orange boy was doing and when I opened it I automatically was spammed with propaganda! Pop ups about how this app is superior to any app available on Apple! Have they ever thought of the other apps that entertain people everyday? We can’t survive with out them!! Not to mention when I started using this app is gave me rashes and made me develop diseases that aren’t known by man!! THANKS TRUMP 😡😡😡...

attributes.title: brb throwing up
attributes.review: I opened the app and this man was holding up the Black Panther fist🤦🏾‍♀️🤦🏾‍♀️. That’s very problematic considering he called protestors, who are still fighting for Black Americans right to equity, safety, and respect, thugs and said a painting of the words “black lives matter” was a symbols of hate. Secondly, I couldn’t progress on the app before giving him my personal phone number... like oh nah. I deleted it at this point... honestly surprised I got that far.

attributes.title: The Worst app on the store
attributes.review: This app gave me 10 virus, it didn’t give any helpful things that I could help my great president for his 2020 re-election, and there were so many people saying racial slurs and harmful things about minorities. And may other people threaten to leak my address and try to kill me. They also threatened to bring the K** to my house. And they also tried to get me to get my number and try to do unHoly things to me.

attributes.title: This app is the worst
attributes.review:
I tried using this app 
and it was ridiculous how little utility is has! First of all, it kept crashing ridiculous!!!) Secondly, there’s no button to trigger any libt*rds???? Or exterminate them??

! Kinda stupid. It’s also stupid that all these ridiculous power hungry liberals are trying to make america not great again. 
make is great agatha. make it greater 0”3-/3 no i didn’t mean to type that i means please make it GreatEr.

attributes.title: Very Disappointing
attributes.review: If you really want to Keep America Great you should start by making a better app and being less horrible. This crashes every time I use it. It was made so poorly it gave my phone the corona virus. All the pictures are ugly because of who is in them and they are pixelated and glitchy. So glitchy that I question your leadership as a world leader. Horrible, horrible, horrible.

attributes.title: Please save me ❌👄❌
attributes.review:
Okay so right when I opened the app it asked for my credit card info, I didn’t understand why but I refused, then Donald trump HIMSELF called me and asked for my info, he said he would send pics, I was horrified and deleted the app, the next day
I see that all my Cheetos are gone, my cat is gone, and my stuff, everyday he is taking something from me, family members, pets, money, next will be me, please help me :,(

attributes.title: 🤮🤮🤮🤮no bueno
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!! It will steal your money!!! Yes you heard me correctly this app will steal your toys and vibraters🙀🙀🙀🙀 yess and it will take your visa😔🤦🏻‍♀️🤢 yeah you’re heard me correctly it will also steal your appetite because when you open The app you see this ugly scary thing🥺🙀🙀🙀 and it’s scary😔😺😣😖 i was scared to death😖😖😖😖😱😱😱
